Name: Draw from the Land
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: You pull strength from the surrounding terrain.

Name: Dual-Weapon Blitz
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You attack as you dash among foes.

Name: Dueling Dance (Swashbuckler)
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Using your free hand as pivot and balance, you both attack and defend with your weapon.

Name: Eidetic Memorization
Benefits: Pathfinders are often asked to study the intricacies of ancient history under less than ideal conditions, and you've trained your brain to make the most of your limited time.

Name: Elastic Mutagen
Benefits: You can cause your body to twist and flow like the quicksilver within your mutagens.

Name: Eldritch Debilitations
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: eldritch trickster racket; Debilitating Strike
Benefits: You know how to apply debilitations that are particularly troublesome for spellcasters.

Name: Elemental Shape
Benefits: You understand the fundamental elements of nature such that you can imbue them into your body.

Name: Elucidating Mercy
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your mercy grants clarity to those around you just when they need it most.

Name: Emerald Boughs Hideaway
Prerequisites: Magaambyan Attendant Dedication; Emerald Boughs affiliation
Benefits: You use Emerald Bough techniques to create a small extradimensional space called a hideaway that lasts as long as you are conscious.

Name: Endure Death's Touch
Prerequisites: Knight Vigilant; expert in medium or heavy armor
Benefits: Your conviction redirects the undead’s attack through your armor and then harmlessly away.

Name: Energy Fusion
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You fuse two spells together, combining their energy types.

Name: Energy Ward
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You trap energy from the last spell you cast within your body, coating your flesh in a protective ward.

Name: Entwined Energy Ki
Source: Pathfinder #166
Benefits: You can transform your inner power into a type of energy to empower your ki abilities.

Name: Everyone Duck!
Benefits: You intentionally set off the trap, but you take special precautions to protect yourself and your allies from the trap’s effects.

Name: Expanded Splash
Benefits: The particularly volatile compounds that you brew into your bombs result in them creating especially large and powerful explosions.

Name: Fading
Benefits: You fade partially from reality.

Name: Fearsome Brute
Benefits: Fear makes your foes weak and more vulnerable to your attacks.

Name: Font of Knowledge
Benefits: Experience or focused study have granted you mastery of a number of topics.

Name: Furious Sprint
Benefits: You rush forward.

Name: Fused Polearm
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: During your daily preparations, you can magically fuse your arcane bonded weapon and a magical staff together into one item, with the staff making up the haft of the weapon.

Name: Gaze of Veracity
Prerequisites: Hellknight Signifer Dedication; ability to cast focus spells
Benefits: You can channel your mask’s power to pierce through lies and see the truth in any situation.

Name: Giant Snare
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You can create bigger snares for quick deployment, making it more likely for a creature to walk into your snares.

Name: Great Cleave
Benefits: Your fury carries your weapon through multiple foes.

Name: Greater Bloodline
Benefits: Further communion with the legacy of your bloodline has uncovered greater secrets.

Name: Greater Debilitating Bomb
Benefits: You have learned enhanced techniques and alchemical secrets that allow you to expand the range of effects you can impose with your bombs.

Name: Greater Magical Edification
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You've continued to expand your compendium of tools to compile knowledge.

Name: Greater Magical Scholastics
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You broaden your magical studies, allowing you to find the right path, detect objects, and conceal those objects from unscrupulous rivals.

Name: Greater Spell Runes
Benefits: You gain more powerful spell runes.

Name: Halcyon Spellcasting Initiate
Benefits: Your knowledge of halcyon magic increases.

Name: Harden Flesh
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: You fortify your skin with minerals drawn from earth and stone.

Name: Harrying Strike
Benefits: Your attack prevents a foe from pursuing your allies.

Name: Healing Transformation
Benefits: You can take advantage of shapechanging magic to close wounds and patch injuries.

Name: Heroic Recovery
Benefits: The restorative power of your healing invigorates the recipient.

Name: House of Imaginary Walls
Benefits: You erect an imaginary barrier others believe to be real.

Name: Hunter's Vision
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You are so focused on your hunted prey that you can see it clearly even beyond the limits of your senses.

Name: Imposing Destrier
Benefits: Under your care, your mount has realized its innate potential.

Name: Impressive Landing
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You slam into the ground, shattering it around you.

Name: Improved Command Undead
Prerequisites: harmful font; Command Undead; evil alignment
Benefits: Undead creatures find it all but impossible to resist your commands.

Name: Improved Knockdown
Benefits: You can dash your foe to the ground with a single blow.

Name: Incredible Companion (Ranger)
Benefits: Your animal companion continues to grow and develop.

Name: Incredible Familiar (Familiar Master)
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your familiar is infused with even more magic than other familiars.

Name: Just One More Thing
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: After your attempt to influence someone goes poorly, you add another bit of information or ask a pointed question, possibly salvaging your previous attempt.

Name: Knockback
Benefits: The weight of your swing drives your enemy back.

Name: Knockback Strike
Benefits: You focus your strength into a blow powerful enough to push an enemy away from you.

Name: Know it All
Source: Pathfinder #164
Benefits: Your knowledge of abstruse topics is unparalleled.

Name: Lastwall Warden
Benefits: Use your shield to protect your allies.

Name: Litany Against Sloth
Prerequisites: devotion spells; tenets of good
Benefits: You rail against the sin of sloth, turning a foe’s laziness against it.

Name: Litany of Self-Interest
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: devotion spells; tenets of evil
Benefits: You compel a creature to act toward its own ends rather than consider others.

Name: Lunging Spellstrike
Source: Secrets of Magic
Prerequisites: Spellstrike, twisting tree hybrid study
Benefits: Your spell unwinds the structure of your staff to make it exceptionally long, or even separate it into shards held together by magical power.

Name: Magical Adaptation
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: When an obstacle bars your path, you pull a trick from your sleeve to overcome it.

Name: Major Lesson
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your patron grants you even greater secrets.

Name: Martial Exercise
Benefits: You've become comfortable in using weapons that you might not have picked up before training with the Swords.

Name: Master Monster Hunter
Benefits: You have a nearly encyclopedic knowledge of all creatures of the world.

Name: Masterful Obfuscation
Prerequisites: master in a skill with the Recall Knowledge action; Scrollmaster Dedication
Benefits: You've mastered the art of deceiving others about your area of study.

Name: Menacing Prowess
Prerequisites: Golden League Xun Dedication; expert in Intimidation
Benefits: Scaring off multiple people at once is your specialty.

Name: Merciful Elixir
Benefits: You mix a special additive into your elixir that calms the drinker’s body and mind.

Name: Merciless Rend
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: Your eidolon rends its foes.

Name: Meteoric Spellstrike
Source: Secrets of Magic
Prerequisites: Spellstrike, starlit span hybrid study
Benefits: A trail of energy flows from your target back to you.

Name: Methodical Debilitations
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: mastermind racket; Debilitating Strike
Benefits: You strategically craft your debilitations to lessen or negate an enemy's tactical advantages.

Name: Mighty Bulwark
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Thanks to your incredible connection to your armor, you can use it to shrug off an incredible array of dangers.

Name: Mirror Shield
Benefits: You reflect the spell back against the triggering opponent.

Name: Monk's Flurry
Benefits: You gain the Flurry of Blows action.

Name: Ode to Ouroboros
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You learn the ode to ouroboros composition spell, which enables you to temporarily spare your allies from death.

Name: Ongoing Strategy
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You're constantly studying small aspects of everyone's movements, even if you don't have a stratagem in place ahead of time.

Name: Oracular Warning
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You have a flash of insight about impending danger related to one ally, and you can shout or gesture to warn that ally of the threat a moment before it materializes.

Name: Overpowering Charge
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You trample your foes as you charge past them.

Name: Overwhelming Energy
Benefits: You alter your spells to overcome resistances.

Name: Peafowl Strut
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You slowly move across the battlefield with dangerous grace.

Name: Penetrating Shot
Benefits: You shoot clear through an intervening creature to hit your prey.

Name: Plant Shape
Prerequisites: leaf order or Wild Shape
Benefits: You can take the form of a plant creature.

Name: Potent Poisoner
Benefits: By concentrating your poisons’ toxic components, you make them harder for victims to resist.

Name: Practiced Defender
Benefits: After extensive practice with the Swords, you're comfortable enough with your shield to move at a normal pace with it raised.

Name: Precise Debilitation
Prerequisites: thief racket; Debilitating Strike
Benefits: You carefully aim and gracefully deliver your debilitations.

Name: Prevailing Position
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: at least one stance feat
Benefits: Your willingness to flow from one stance to another lets you sacrifice their benefits to better protect yourself.

Name: Pristine Weapon
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your verdant weapon can cut through the resistances of magical creatures.

Name: Protective Bond
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: The power of your bond can protect you and your eidolon from harm.

Name: Provocator Dedication
Benefits: For you, fighting is as much about style as skill.

Name: Pushing Attack
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: Your eidolon has an attack that pushes away enemies.

Name: Quicken Heartbeat
Benefits: You’ve replaced your heart with one made of animated quicksilver and living adamantine.

Name: Quickened Casting
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You are able to quickly cast a spell.

Name: Radiant Blade Spirit
Benefits: Your divine ally radiates power, enhancing your chosen weapon.

Name: Rain-Scribe Mobility
Benefits: You surround yourself in a mantle of Rain-Scribe magic and Stride twice; difficult terrain does not reduce your Speed, even if the difficult terrain has been manipulated by magic.

Name: Rapid Recharge
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: You tap into an arcane trick to recover your ability to meld spells and attacks.

Name: Recover Spell
Benefits: You recover the energy of a recently disrupted spell, allowing you to cast it again as long as you do so immediately before the energy dissipates.

Name: Reflexive Riposte
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You can riposte almost without a thought.

Name: Replenishment of War
Prerequisites: expert in your deity’s favored weapon
Benefits: Striking out against your enemies draws praise and protection from your deity.

Name: Resilient Touch
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: devotion spell (lay on hands)
Benefits: Your healing energies create an aura of protection that defends your allies against more than just blades and arrows.

Name: Resounding Blow
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You strike your enemy in the head with such force that their ears ring.

Name: Rockslide Spell
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: You enhance your spell with elemental earth, causing chunks of stone to litter the ground.

Name: Rope Mastery
Prerequisites: Golden League Xun Dedication; expert in Athletics
Benefits: Ropes are your tool of choice, and you deploy them in versatile ways.

Name: Rubbery Skin
Benefits: Your skin develops a malleable, rubbery quality.

Name: Saving Slash
Benefits: Make a check to reduce a critical hit against you to a normal hit.

Name: Scout's Pounce
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You leap from the shadows to strike your foes.

Name: Scroll Savant
Benefits: During your daily preparations, you can create two temporary scrolls containing arcane spells from your spellbook.

Name: Shadow Magic
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You gain the ability to fuse and play with shadows by using focus spells specific to shadowdancers.

Name: Shadow Reservoir
Source: Secrets of Magic
Prerequisites: ability to cast spells from spell slots; Shadowcaster Dedication
Benefits: Your own shadow speaks to you, providing knowledge of spells and a reservoir of magical power.

Name: Shadow Sneak Attack
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You gain the sneak attack class feature, except you deal 1d6 precision damage regardless of your level.

Name: Shall Not Falter, Shall Not Rout
Benefits: You gain the shall not falter, shall not rout focus spell.

Name: Shared Avoidance
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You can project your premonitions of danger to your allies.

Name: Shared Synergy
Benefits: You can grant the benefit from Dualistic Synergy to an ally within 30 feet instead of yourself, either allowing that ally to Recall Knowledge, granting that ally temporary Hit Points, or both, depending on the spell’s tradition.

Name: Shattering Strike (Weapon Improviser)
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: The improvised weapon shatters, destroying it completely but dealing an additional 3d6 piercing damage to the creature you hit with the Improvised Pummel.

Name: Shield of Faith
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Residual energy from your domain spells bolsters your defenses.

Name: Shield of Reckoning
Benefits: When you shield your ally against an attack, you call upon your power to protect your ally further.

Name: Side by Side (Druid)
Benefits: You and your animal companion fight in tandem, distracting your foes and keeping them off balance.

Name: Signature Spell Expansion
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your innate connection to magic lets you cast more spells with greater freedom.

Name: Signifer's Sight
Benefits: The magic flowing through your signifer’s mask allows you to see in the dark, and the mask dampens the distraction caused by sudden flashes of bright light.

Name: Silencing Strike
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: A quick strike to the face or mouth silences your opponent.

Name: Silent Sting
Prerequisites: Golden League Xun Dedication; expert in Stealth
Benefits: You quickly hide your weapon to make it difficult to pin the attack on you.

Name: Six Pillars Stance
Benefits: You stand firm, steeling your mind and body, allowing you to use your magic unperturbed.

Name: Sleeper Hold
Benefits: You pinch crucial points of your target’s nervous system, impeding its ability to function.

Name: Sneak Savant
Benefits: It is almost impossible to spot you without taking effort to look.

Name: Spellmaster's Ward
Benefits: You can create a number of powerful shielding runes that bolster your defenses against damaging spells by absorbing the worst of the energy to keep you safe.

Name: Spy's Countermeasures
Benefits: You’ve learned how to analyze and fake your responses to the most common magic used against spies.

Name: Steal the Sky
Benefits: You can take away the air that keeps a flying foe aloft.

Name: Surging Might
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: With a complex gesture, you focus the divine power of your spell to overcome enemies' resistances.

Name: Suspect of Opportunity
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Sometimes something intrudes upon your case unexpectedly, such as an ambush sent to bring your investigation to a close.

Name: Sustaining Steel
Source: Secrets of Magic
Prerequisites: Arcane Cascade, inexorable iron hybrid study
Benefits: You pull magic into your weapon, using its substance to transform the magic into restorative energy.

Name: Symphony of the Unfettered Heart
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You learn the symphony of the unfettered heart composition spell, which enables you to protect an ally against incapacitating conditions.

Name: Tactical Debilitations
Prerequisites: scoundrel racket; Debilitating Strike
Benefits: You learn new debilitations that grant you tactical advantages against your foes.

Name: Tangle of Battle
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your incredibly vicious Strike pulls you right in close, giving you the opportunity to grab your foe.

Name: Targeting Finisher
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your attack harms and hinders your foe.

Name: Tempest-Sun Shielding
Benefits: You transform unrealized spell energy into a protective shield.

Name: Temporary Potions
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: During your daily preparations, you can create a batch of two temporary oils or potions using a formula you know.

Name: Terrain Transposition
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You are so connected to the wilderness that you can magically jump from place to place within it.

Name: Terrifying Howl
Benefits: You unleash a terrifying howl.

Name: Through Spell
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Spells you cast can transform briefly into vital essence, traveling harmlessly through living and undead creatures between you and your target, blocked only by solid objects.

Name: Tiller's Aid
Benefits: You can quickly Aid your crop.

Name: Tiller's Drive
Benefits: Increase your Speed and that of your crop.

Name: Topple Foe
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You take advantage of the opening created by your ally to tip your foe off their feet.

Name: Trampling Charge
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You urge your mount forward, trampling enemies in your path.

Name: Transpose
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: You switch places with your eidolon.

Name: Tumbling Opportunist
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You use a burst of stamina to perform a breathtaking feat of Acrobatics as you speed through a foe's space, leaving your foe lying flat on their back.

Name: Twin Riposte
Benefits: A clever parry with one weapon leaves your opponent open to an attack with the other weapon.

Name: Uncanny Dodge
Benefits: You gain the deny advantage class feature.

Name: Unseat
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You attempt to knock an opponent off their mount.

Name: Unstable Concoction
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You can create extraordinary—albeit volatile—alchemical wonders, though they have an unfortunate tendency to violently explode when you use them.

Name: Unusual Composition
Benefits: You can translate the emotion and power of a composition to other mediums.

Name: Uzunjati Recollection
Prerequisites: Uzunjati Storytelling; master in a Recall Knowledge skill
Benefits: You tell a story spontaneously from nearly forgotten facts, delving into your memory and entertaining your audience in the process.

Name: Vicious Debilitations
Prerequisites: ruffian racket; Debilitating Strike
Benefits: The debilitations you dish out seriously impair your foes.

Name: Vigil's Walls Rise Anew!
Benefits: You can train your allies to Raise a Shield on your order

Name: Ward Casting
Benefits: You carefully ward your spell by drawing from a mantle of magical energy you prepared to protect your casting, increasing your chance of retaining the spell.

Name: Warden's Step
Benefits: You can guide your allies to move quietly through the wilderness.

Name: Weapon-Rune Shifter
Source: Pathfinder #148
Benefits: You learn how to alter the magic of weapon runes by using a crystal as a focusing component.

Name: Weighty Impact
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: Your eidolon knocks enemies down.

Name: Whirlwind Stance
Source: Pathfinder #151
Prerequisites: Staff Acrobat Dedication; expert proficiency in your staff
Benefits: You use your staff as a defensive implement as well as an offensive one.

Name: Widen the Gap
Benefits: Once you have penetrated a foe’s defenses, you can home in on the same spot to exploit your opponent’s wound and deal some serious damage.

Name: Wind Jump
Benefits: You gather the wind beneath you, allowing you to soar as you jump.

Name: Winding Flow
Benefits: Any journey consists of more than simply reaching your destination.

Name: Witch's Communion
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You can keep watch over multiple charges.

Name: Wronged Monk's Wrath
Source: Pathfinder #166
Benefits: You gain the wronged monk's wrath ki spell.

Name: A Home in Every Port
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Spend downtime to gain free lodging for a night.

Name: Caravan Leader
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your group can Hustle for much longer.

Name: Incredible Investiture
Benefits: Invest up to 12 magic items.

Name: Incredible Scout
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Grant allies +2 to initiative rolls when Scouting.

Name: Additional Shadow Magic
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Choose an additional shadowdancer focus spell you haven't already selected from Shadow Magic.

Name: Advanced Order Training
Prerequisites: Hellknight Armiger Dedication; Hellknight Dedication or Hellknight Signifer Dedication
Benefits: You gain the greater order benefit for the Hellknight order to which you belong.

Name: Advanced Seeker of Truths
Source: Pathfinder #164
Prerequisites: Eldritch Researcher Dedication; Seeker of Truths
Benefits: You have unlocked deeper secrets to uncovering and hoarding lore.

Name: Aegis of Arnisant
Prerequisites: Knight Vigilant; Shield Block; master in Religion
Benefits: Inspired by the tale of Arnisant, you transform your shield into a magic ward.

Name: Affliction Mercy
Benefits: The divine grace that flows through you grants reprieve from an affliction.

Name: Amplifying Touch
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: devotion spell (lay on hands)
Benefits: Your healing energies empower attacks.

Name: Assassinate
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You strike with one swift movement, trying to instantly slay your mark.

Name: Aura of Faith
Benefits: You radiate an aura of pure belief that imbues your attacks and those of nearby allies with holy power.

Name: Beastmaster's Call
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You quickly call in a primal projection of a non-active companion to provide the companion's support benefit.

Name: Blade of Justice
Benefits: You call upon divine power and make a weapon or unarmed Strike against a foe you have witnessed harming an ally or innocent.

Name: Blade of Law
Benefits: You call upon the power of law and make a weapon or unarmed Strike against a foe you have witnessed breaking or disrespecting the law or otherwise acting disorderly.

Name: Blade of the Crimson Oath
Benefits: You call upon the Crimson Oath to smite undead and then make a weapon or unarmed Strike against an undead foe.

Name: Blessed Denial
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You exude peace and protection, lessening a harmful condition as it falls upon an ally.

Name: Blood Component Substitution
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You can bypass the need for incantations and gestures by drawing energy directly from your blood, causing you to visibly glow the color of your blood and crackle with magical energy.

Name: Bloodline Focus
Benefits: Your bloodline cause you to recover focus faster.

Name: Bloody Debilitations
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: Debilitating Strike; trained in Medicine
Benefits: Your attacks slice arteries and veins.

Name: Brutal Finish
Benefits: Your final blow can make an impact even if it rebounds off a foe’s defenses.

Name: Cartwheel Dodge
Benefits: You can dodge away from damaging effects.

Name: Champion's Sacrifice
Benefits: You can suffer so that others might live.

Name: Charged Creation
Benefits: Your magic is drawn to your persistent creations.

Name: Cheat Death
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Somehow you always escape the reaper by a hair's breadth.

Name: Clever Counterspell
Benefits: You creatively apply your prepared spells to counterspell a much wider variety of your opponents’ magic.

Name: Communal Sustain
Benefits: Choose one spell with a sustained duration that one of your allies has in effect.

Name: Conflux Focus
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: You imagine how you'll weave magic and combat into future battles, improving your focus.

Name: Coordinated Charge
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You heroically dash into the fray, inspiring your allies to follow.

Name: Coordinated Distraction
Benefits: You distract an opponent from the fact that one of your allies is about to attack them.

Name: Critical Debilitations
Benefits: Your debilitations are especially effective on your most powerful attacks.

Name: Cut the Bonds
Prerequisites: Bellflower Dedication; expert in a melee weapon
Benefits: You can counteract a magical effect that impedes movement.

Name: Daredevil's Gambit
Benefits: If you critically succeed at your Daring Act, you can enter the target’s space and remain there until the beginning of your next turn or until the target moves, whichever comes first.

Name: Deadly Poison Weapon
Source: Pathfinder #149
Benefits: Your poisons are devastatingly potent.

Name: Defensive Recovery
Prerequisites: harmful font or healing font
Benefits: Your faith provides temporary protection in addition to healing.

Name: Determined Lore Seeker
Benefits: You've mastered useful spells that let you find hidden truths others might miss.

Name: Diamond Soul
Benefits: You have fortified your body and mind against eldritch effects.

Name: Disrupt Ki
Benefits: Your strike can block a creature's inner life force.

Name: Distracting Shot
Benefits: The sheer power of your attacks, or the overwhelming number of them, leaves an enemy flustered.

Name: Diverse Weapon Expert
Prerequisites: Fighter Dedication; expert in any kind of weapon or unarmed attack
Benefits: Your proficiency ranks for simple weapons and martial weapons increase to expert.

Name: Divine Wall
Benefits: You use your shield to harry your enemies, preventing them from stepping away from or around you.

Name: Diviner Sense
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You sense magical dangers.

Name: Dodging Roll
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You dodge a blow at the last possible moment.

Name: Domain Fluency
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You command a deep understanding of the divine domains related to your mystery.

Name: Domain Focus
Benefits: Your devotion to your deity’s domains grows greater, and so does the power granted to you.

Name: Double Prey
Benefits: You can focus on two foes at once, hunting both of them down.

Name: Dragon Shape
Benefits: You can take on the form of some of the world’s most fearsome creatures.

Name: Dragon's Rage Wings
Benefits: You sprout dragon wings from your back.

Name: Dueling Dance (Fighter)
Benefits: Using your free hand as pivot and balance, you both attack and defend with your weapon.

Name: Eclectic Polymath
Benefits: Your flexible mind can quickly shift spells.

Name: Educated Assessment
Benefits: You attempt to Recall Knowledge about a creature, and the GM uses the same secret roll result against the creature’s Deception or Stealth DC, giving you the information from a Battle Assessment.

Name: Emblazon Antimagic
Benefits: Your deity’s symbol protects against offensive magic.

Name: Embrace the Pain
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Ignoring your pain, you reach out and grab the creature or weapon that caused you harm.

Name: Emergency Medical Assistance
Benefits: You've learned a variety of methods for helping allies who are bleeding, burning, or otherwise suffering persistent damage, from brushing off acid to patting down fires.

Name: Enforce Oath
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: You've sworn to an oath against a specific type of creature.
Benefits: You call on your oath to embolden you in combat.

Name: Enigma's Knowledge
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your muse whispers knowledge to you at all the right times.

Name: Evasiveness (Rogue)
Prerequisites: Rogue Dedication; expert in Reflex saves
Benefits: You gain the deny advantage class feature.

Name: Evasiveness (Swashbuckler)
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: Swashbuckler Dedication; expert in Reflex saves
Benefits: Your proficiency rank for Reflex saves increases to master.

Name: Expert Bard Spellcasting
Benefits: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits for bard spellcasting.

Name: Expert Cathartic Spellcasting
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits.

Name: Expert Cleric Spellcasting
Prerequisites: Basic Cleric Spellcasting; master in Religion
Benefits: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits for cleric spellcasting.

Name: Expert Combat Eidolon
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: Your eidolon advances its capabilities in combat.

Name: Expert Druid Spellcasting
Prerequisites: Basic Druid Spellcasting; master in Nature
Benefits: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits for druid spellcasting.

Name: Expert Eldritch Archer Spellcasting
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits.

Name: Expert Magus Spellcasting
Source: Secrets of Magic
Prerequisites: Basic Magus Spellcasting; master in Arcana
Benefits: You gain the expert bounded spellcasting benefits.

Name: Expert Oracle Spellcasting
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: Basic Oracle Spellcasting; master in Religion
Benefits: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits.

Name: Expert Scroll Cache
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your scroll collection is more powerful.

Name: Expert Sorcerer Spellcasting
Prerequisites: Basic Sorcerer Spellcasting; master in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion, depending on bloodline
Benefits: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits for sorcerer spellcasting.

Name: Expert Spellcasting
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: You gain the expert spellcasting archetype benefits.

Name: Expert Summoner Spellcasting
Source: Secrets of Magic
Prerequisites: Basic Summoner Spellcasting; master in the skill associated with your eidolon's tradition
Benefits: You gain the expert bounded spellcasting benefits.

Name: Expert Witch Spellcasting
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: Basic Witch Spellcasting; master in the skill associated with your patron's tradition
Benefits: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits.

Name: Expert Wizard Spellcasting
Prerequisites: Basic Wizard Spellcasting; master in Arcana
Benefits: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits for wizard spellcasting.

Name: Extend Elixir
Benefits: Integrating your own personal energy into the elixirs you create causes them to affect you for longer.

Name: Familiar's Eyes
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You use your familiar's senses as easily as your own.

Name: Fantastic Leap
Benefits: You launch yourself through the air at a foe.

Name: Felling Shot
Benefits: Your ranged attacks can shoot an unprepared foe right out of the air.

Name: Flexible Halcyon Spellcasting
Benefits: You broaden your ability to channel your power into halcyon magic.

Name: Flexible Transmogrification
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: You've learned how to transmogrify your eidolon to suit the circumstances of the day.

Name: Flicker
Benefits: You use your movements and disguises to make yourself a flickering blur.

Name: Flinging Shove
Benefits: Your opponets go even farther when push them around.

Name: Flourishing Finish
Benefits: Your martial prowess demoralizes all who can see you.

Name: Focused Shot
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You achieve a state of perfect calm before unleashing your attack, opening your mind to the minute movements of the world around you to increase your accuracy.

Name: Forcible Energy
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You perform complex manipulations to make the energy from your spells so powerful that your enemies remain vulnerable to it afterward.

Name: Foresee Danger
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You perceive every possible way your foe's attack could land and attempt to avoid them all.

Name: Frightening Appearance
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your dramatic appearances can frighten bystanders.

Name: Furious Grab
Benefits: You grab your foe while it’s distracted by your attack.

Name: Grasping Limbs
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: Your eidolon grabs enemies.

Name: Greater Physical Evolution
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You hold a deep understanding of the innate fundamental structures of the physical world, and you can enforce your will upon that structure as far as your own blood is concerned.

Name: Greater Revelation
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You learn a greater revelation spell associated with your mystery.

Name: Greater Spiritual Evolution
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your magical blood is rich with spiritual essence, and this infusion within you allows your spells to be fully effective against incorporeal creatures, spirits, and creatures on the Ethereal Plane.

Name: Green Tongue
Benefits: You share a special kinship with all things green and living.

Name: Gruesome Strike
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: tenets of evil; champion's reaction that grants extra damage with your Strikes
Benefits: Make a Strike against the creature that triggered your champion's reaction.

Name: Hellknight Order Cross-Training
Prerequisites: Hellknight Armiger Dedication; Hellknight Dedication or Hellknight Signifer Dedication
Benefits: You gain the lesser order benefit of a Hellknight order other than the one to which you belong.

Name: Hell's Armaments
Benefits: You’ve trained with your order’s weapon and your Hellknight plate long enough to apply your expertise from other weapons and armor.

Name: Hex Focus
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your patron's teachings have allowed you to achieve a deeper focus.

Name: Improved Dueling Riposte
Benefits: Your weapon whirls and darts, striking foes whenever the opportunity presents itself.

Name: Improved Knockback
Benefits: Your shoves cause the target to go farther.

Name: Incredible Ricochet
Benefits: After your first shot singles out your opponent's position, you direct another that ricochets around obstacles and strikes unerringly.

Name: Infectious Emotions
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: When you use Catharsis, one ally within 30 feet gains the catharsis activation benefits in addition to you.

Name: Inspirational Focus
Benefits: Your connection to your muse has granted you unusual focus.

Name: Interfering Surge
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: You overcharge the triggering spell with magic.

Name: Invincible Mutagen
Benefits: The fortifying additives you brew into your mutagens make your juggernaut form impervious.

Name: Janatimo's Lessons
Benefits: Thanks to Janatimo's secret techniques, you can weave your knowledge and words into powerful tools to assist your allies in life-threatening situations.

Name: Judgement of the Monolith
Benefits: You can use your ka stone to compel the truth.

Name: Juggernaut's Fortitude
Prerequisites: Barbarian Dedication; expert in Fortitude Saves
Benefits: Your proficiency rank in Fortitude saves increases to master.

Name: Knight in Shining Armor
Prerequisites: Knight Vigilant; expert in light armor, medium armor, or unarmored defense; trained in heavy armor
Benefits: As a knight in shining armor, you train daily in the heaviest armor, expanding your expertise to heavy armor.

Name: Lasting Doubt
Benefits: When you cast doubt upon your foes, the effect lasts longer than usual.

Name: Legs of Stone
Benefits: You gain a +2 status bonus to your Fortitude and Reflex DCs against attempts to Shove or Trip you.

Name: Liberating Stride
Benefits: Your allies can move farther when you release them from harm.

Name: Lightning Snares
Prerequisites: Quick Snares; Snare Specialist; master in Crafting
Benefits: You can rig a trap with incredible speed.

Name: Link Focus
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: Your focus recovers faster.

Name: Lunging Stance
Benefits: Your body coiled to strike, you can lash out at distant enemies.

Name: Magic Sense
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: You have a literal sixth sense for magic.

Name: Maneuvering Spell
Benefits: You instantly tap into the magical power of a spell you're casting to quickly pounce around the battlefield.

Name: Master Alchemy
Benefits: Your advanced alchemy level increases to 7.

Name: Master Spotter (Investigator)
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your proficiency rank in Perception increases to master.

Name: Master Spotter (Ranger)
Benefits: Your proficiency rank in Perception increases to master.

Name: Meditative Focus
Benefits: Your meditation is so effective that you can achieve a deep focus.

Name: Mobile Finisher
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You attack in motion.

Name: Overwhelming Breath
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You control your breathing and align it with your ki, exhaling with controlled force in order to overcome your opponent's resistance.

Name: Overwhelming Spellstrike
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: You pierce through your foe's resistance.

Name: Pale Horse
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: divine ally (steed); tenets of evil
Benefits: Your mount becomes a grotesque creature of foreboding when you ride it.

Name: Paragon's Guard
Benefits: Once you’ve had a moment to set your stance, you always have your shield ready without a thought.

Name: Perfection's Path
Prerequisites: Monk Dedication; expert in at least one saving throw
Benefits: Increase the proiciency rank for one saving throw to master.

Name: Pesh Skin
Source: Pathfinder #149
Benefits: Your plant form sprouts hundreds of spines, and your blood causes mild hallucinations in creatures exposed to it.

Name: Plentiful Snares
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You can prepare incredible numbers of snares each day out of simple ingredients.

Name: Predator's Pounce
Benefits: You close the distance to your prey in a blur.

Name: Preparation
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You survey the battlefield, calculating the possibilities.

Name: Primal Focus
Benefits: Your connection to nature is particularly strong, and the spirits of nature flock around you, helping you replenish your focus.

Name: Primal Summons
Benefits: Whenever you summon an ally, you can empower it with the elemental power of air, earth, fire, or water.

Name: Purifying Spell
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: You purify the water within a creature's body to cleanse them of illness.

Name: Reactive Interference
Benefits: You reflexively foil an enemy’s response.

Name: Read the Land
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: You've learned how to commune with the land to learn information.

Name: Reaper of Repose
Prerequisites: Knight Reclaimant Dedication; master proficiency in a weapon
Benefits: Your skill and fervor allow you to pierce undead defenses and exploit their weaknesses.

Name: Reason Rapidly
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your mind works through clues at an unbelievable speed.

Name: Recollect Studies
Prerequisites: Swordmaster Dedication; expert in a skill used to Recall Knowledge
Benefits: You paid attention during your studies and remember the right way to attack various creatures.

Name: Redirect Elements
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: You seize the elemental essence of an incoming spell and redirect the spell to a creature of your choice within the spell's area.

Name: Reverberate
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You can manipulate the acoustics around you to deflect sonic damage back at its source.

Name: Ricochet Feint
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: While in Ricochet Stance, you can bounce a thrown weapon off a foe to distract them.

Name: Rugged Survivalist
Benefits: You've studied survival skills with the School of Swords experts and are comfortable spending long periods of time in the wilderness.

Name: School Counterspell
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: Your intricate knowledge of your school lets you easily negate spells from that school.

Name: Second Sting
Benefits: You read your prey’s movements and transform them into openings, so failures with one weapon set up glancing blows with the other.

Name: Secrets of Shadow
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: Your shadow's voice grows ever clearer; it whispers secrets of true power to you and shields your flesh from harm.

Name: Sense Ki
Benefits: You can read the presence of ki in your area.

Name: Shadow Illusion
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: With an artful eye, you shape shadows into illusory forms.

Name: Shaped Contaminant
Source: Pathfinder #149
Benefits: Through a combination of careful manipulation and precise breath control, you can deploy inhaled toxins precisely.

Name: Shared Assault
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: In the triumph of battle, you can share the glory with another ally.

Name: Shared Replenishment
Benefits: When your deity blesses your warlike acts, you can extend that favor to your allies.

Name: Shield Salvation
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You can save your shield from total destruction, even after a devastating attack.

Name: Shoulder Catastrophe
Benefits: You’ve trained to protect your allies by diverting the worst attacks to yourself.

Name: Side by Side (Ranger)
Benefits: You and your animal companion fight in tandem, distracting your foes and keeping them of balance.

Name: Signifer Armor Expertise
Benefits: You’ve spent enough time helping your comrades equip medium and heavy armor that you spread your own expertise to those armors as well.

Name: Silver's Refrain
Benefits: Learn the silver's refrain composition cantrip.

Name: Sing to the Steel
Source: Pathfinder #170
Benefits: You strike magical tones that can turn the tide of combat.

Name: Speaking Sky
Benefits: You can hear air movement like soft whispers.

Name: Spellmaster's Resilience
Benefits: Your experience with a specific type of harmful magic makes you more resistant to it.

Name: Spirit's Wrath
Benefits: You call forth an ephemeral apparition.

Name: Splendid Companion
Source: Pathfinder #152
Benefits: Your animal companion continues to develop.

Name: Spring Attack
Benefits: Springing away from one foe, you Strike at another.

Name: Spring from the Shadows
Benefits: Leaping out from hiding, you assail your target when they least expect it.

Name: Stance Savant (Monk)
Benefits: You enter a stance without a thought.

Name: Student of the Dueling Arts
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You have studied a great many combat techniques, which you can review each day.

Name: Summoner's Call
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: In a moment of danger, you call your eidolon to your side.

Name: Sunder Spell
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You draw upon your superstitious fury to destroy a spell.

Name: Swap Investment
Benefits: Your time as a Pathfinder has taught you how to improvise, and you've learned to make use of the resources you find in the field.

Name: Tense Negotiator
Benefits: You often find that the best way to win a conflict means avoiding a fight in the first place.

Name: Titan's Stature
Benefits: You grow to even greater size.

Name: Towering Size
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: Your eidolon becomes even bigger.

Name: Unbalancing Sweep
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You make a great sweep about yourself, knocking creatures off their feet and away from you.

Name: Uncanny Bombs
Benefits: You lob bombs unerringly, despite obstructions or distance.

Name: Uncanny Suction
Benefits: Your limbs produce strange, sucker-like growths that allow you to adhere to walls, objects, and most other surfaces.

Name: Vernai Training
Prerequisites: Achaekek's Grip; Advanced Red Mantis Magic
Benefits: To resurrect a creature you've slain, a spellcaster must counteract your influence on its death.

Name: Wandering Oasis
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You're surrounded by soothing energy.

Name: Warden's Focus
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your connection with your surroundings grows deeper as you focus.

Name: Wave Spiral
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: You dip and spin, unleashing a wide whirlpool of water.

Name: Wild Strider
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Natural obstacles pose no obstacle to you.

Name: Wings of the Dragon
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You can manifest draconic wings to soar through the air at great speed.

Name: Words of Unraveling
Source: Pathfinder #164
Benefits: You have unlocked abstruse methods to tangle with reality itself, altering the fate of a single individual.

Name: Aasimar's Mercy
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your celestial powers allow you to remove lesser afflictions with ease.

Name: Advanced General Training
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Over the course of adventuring, your adaptability has let you pick up numerous useful abilities.

Name: Airy Step
Benefits: You create a blanket of fog in a 5–foot burst centered on one corner of your space.

Name: Alter Resistance
Benefits: You focus on your protean forebears to change your energy resistance.

Name: Ancestor's Rage
Source: The Mwangi Expanse
Benefits: You transform into an enormous otherworldly hyena.

Name: Ancestor's Transformation
Benefits: You can commune with ancestor spirits to assume the form of an enormous primeval strix.

Name: Aquatic Adaptation
Benefits: If you and up to four other creatures are in contact with a body of water deep enough for you to fully submerge, you can spend 10 minutes adapting the creatures to that specific body of water.

Name: Aquatic Camouflage
Benefits: You blend into the waves.

Name: Arcane Sight
Source: The Mwangi Expanse
Prerequisites: ability to cast the detect magic cantrip
Benefits: You've trained yourself to constantly be on the lookout for magical effects, even when focusing on looking out for other things.

Name: Arise, ye Worthy!
Benefits: You are descended from the valkyries who protect worthy souls, and can hold back death's grasp.

Name: Augment Senses
Benefits: You open vestigial eyes, unfurl tympanic flaps of skin, or otherwise enhance your senses.

Name: Avenge Ally
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Though you know that you will eventually outlive your companions, seeing them at death's door brings clarity to your attacks.

Name: Azarketi Weapon Expertise
Source: Azarketi Ancestry Web Supplement
Benefits: Your mastery with weapons both above and below water is unmatched.

Name: Black Cat Curse
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You hiss a spiteful curse at the creature.

Name: Bone Investiture
Benefits: You encase yourself in spiritual dinosaur bones to become a Huge dinosaur.

Name: Bounce Back
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You recover from near-death experiences with astounding resilience.

Name: Calaca's Showstopper
Benefits: You've spent many an evening learning songs and tales featuring calacas, death's wandering minstrels.

Name: Call of the Green Man
Benefits: You can call forth nearby nature spirits to augment your body.

Name: Can't Fall Here
Benefits: You physically help an ally remain standing and encourage them to push through their pain against dire odds.

Name: Caterwaul
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You give a daring yowl in the face of adversity, calling your companion back from the brink of unconsciousness.

Name: Catfolk Weapon Expertise
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You are well-trained in traditional catfolk weapons

Name: Ceaseless Shadows
Benefits: You excel at going unnoticed, especially among a crowd.

Name: Celestial Strikes
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your connection to good arms all your attacks against forces of evil.

Name: Ceremony of Growth
Source: The Mwangi Expanse
Benefits: You can alter your exoskeleton's size.

Name: Cloak of Poison
Benefits: You secrete a cloak of concentrated poison that harms any who dare attack you.

Name: Cobble Dancer
Benefits: You know how to take advantage of foes thrown off-balance by unstable flooring, loose cobblestones, or similar impediments.

Name: Conrasu Weapon Expertise
Source: The Mwangi Expanse
Benefits: Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency for conrasu weapons.

Name: Consistent Surge
Benefits: Your nanites are incredibly effective, capable of improving your body's efficiency regularly.

Name: Continuous Assault
Benefits: You can use Elemental Assault once per hour instead of once per day.

Name: Daywalker
Benefits: Whether through painstaking exposure, devoted prayer, or simple luck, you've found a greater affinity for life through the sun's light.

Name: Delver
Source: The Mwangi Expanse
Benefits: Subterranean life taught you to swim through the ground like water.

Name: Dire Form
Benefits: Your hybrid shape is a hulking beast.

Name: Dwarven Weapon Expertise
Benefits: Your dwarven affinity blends with your training, granting you great skill with dwarven weapons.

Name: Eclectic Sword Mastery
Benefits: You instinctively learn how to use a sword with just a few practice swings.

Name: Elite Dracomancer
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your magic rivals that of lesser dragons.

Name: Elven Weapon Expertise
Benefits: Your elven affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with elven weapons.

Name: Enforced Order
Benefits: You never fail to strike down the ever-expanding reaches of chaos.

Name: Envenomed Edge
Source: The Mwangi Expanse
Benefits: With a combination of your poison glands and herbal concoctions, you can consistently deliver venomous attacks when you hit an enemy's weak points.

Name: Ferocious Beasts
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: Beast Trainer or animal companion; Orc Ferocity
Benefits: Since ancient times, the mightiest orc beast tamers would draw out the true fighting spirit of their companion beasts by feeding the creatures a draft incorporating the orc's own blood.

Name: Fey Skin
Benefits: While you are more susceptible to cold iron than most of the Wingless, you also have an incredible resilience and a deeper connection to the healing energies of the First World.

Name: Fiendish Strikes
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your festering connection to the forces of evil infuses your weapons with debilitating malevolence, tearing down creatures of good with every attack.

Name: Fiend's Door
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Like many fiends, you have the supernatural ability to teleport yourself to safety.

Name: Finest Trick
Benefits: Many fiends—rakshasa rajas and demonic succubi most famously—can take on the forms of others.

Name: Flame Jump
Benefits: Your peri lineage has opened your mind to fire's raw, purging essence.

Name: Form of the Bat
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You can transform into a harmless bat.

Name: Formation Master
Benefits: You can assemble a formation even with members of ancestries that lack the hobgoblins’ military discipline, and you can extend these benefits to your hobgoblin allies.

Name: Fully Flighted
Benefits: You gain the effects of Juvenile Flight at all times, rather than just once per day for 10 minutes.

Name: Genie Weapon Expertise
Benefits: Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency in falchions, ranseurs, scimitars, tridents, and all geniekin weapons in which you are trained.

Name: Gift of the Moon
Benefits: You can share your power with others, but they can't escape the werecreature's curse as easily as you can.

Name: Gnoll Weapon Expertise
Source: The Mwangi Expanse
Benefits: You fight with effortless expertise with gnoll weapons.

Name: Gnome Weapon Expertise
Benefits: Your gnome affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with gnome weapons.

Name: Goblin Weapon Expertise
Benefits: Your goblin affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with goblin weapons.

Name: Grippli Weapon Expertise
Source: The Mwangi Expanse
Benefits: You fight with effortless expertise with grippli weapons.

Name: Hag Magic
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Through your heritage, you can replicate some of a hag's magic.

Name: Halfling Weapon Expertise
Benefits: Your halfling affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with halfling weapons.

Name: Harbinger's Caw
Benefits: You caw ominously, cursing the creature with misfortune.

Name: Hatchling Flight
Benefits: You can fly a little!

Name: Hobgoblin Weapon Expertise
Benefits: You increase your training in battlefield weapons.

Name: Hydraulic Maneuvers
Benefits: You batter your foes with a torrent of water siphoned from your surroundings.

Name: Impose Order
Benefits: You shift the underlying fabric of reality to impose a baseline of order.

Name: Improved Elemental Bulwark
Benefits: You gain resistance 10 from Elemental Bulwark instead of 5.

Name: Incredible Ferocity
Benefits: Given time to collect yourself after a near-death scrape, you can rebuild your ferocity and withstand additional finishing blows.

Name: Incredible Luck (Halfling)
Benefits: Even other halflings consider you to be particularly lucky.

Name: Inspirit Hazard
Benefits: You awaken a spirit of creation within the hazard.

Name: Instinctive Obfuscation
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: at least one arcane or occult innate spell gained from a gnome heritage or gnome ancestry feat
Benefits: The magic within you manifests as a natural reaction to threats.

Name: Invisible Trickster
Benefits: You have learned how to become invisible and remain so.

Name: Irriseni Ice-Witch
Benefits: You can trace your direct descent from one of the Queens of Irrisen and thus from Baba Yaga herself.

Name: Iruxi Spirit Strike
Benefits: Your iruxi unarmed attacks channel the spiritual energy of your ancestors.

Name: Jinx Glutton
Benefits: You can Eat Fortune once per hour, rather than once per day.

Name: Killing Stone
Benefits: Your star orb hides a deadly miasma.

Name: Kitsune Spell Expertise
Benefits: Your tails show your magical mastery.

Name: Kobold Weapon Expertise
Benefits: Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the crossbow, greatpick, light pick, pick, and spear, as well as any kobold weapons in which you are trained.

Name: Lifeblood's Call
Benefits: The impulse to survive and continue fighting resonates deep within you.

Name: Mask of Fear
Benefits: Your warmask burns off of your face, releasing your apprehension.

Name: Metal-Veined Strikes
Benefits: Metallic veins grow throughout your body, giving your unarmed attacks a metallic sheen.

Name: Mischievous Tail
Benefits: Your tail can bedevil your foes.

Name: Mist Strider
Benefits: You condense the moisture in the air, solidifying it so it can hold your weight.

Name: None Shall Know
Source: The Mwangi Expanse
Benefits: Even magical means have a hard time prying information from you.

Name: One with Earth
Benefits: You've learned to harness your connection to the earth to travel through it.

Name: Orc Weapon Expertise
Benefits: Your orc affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with orc weapons.

Name: Primal Rampage
Benefits: You tap into the unstoppable, primeval strength of your ancient kin.

Name: Purge Sins
Benefits: You call on your celestial forebears to rid your body of all toxins and impurities.

Name: Radiant Burst
Benefits: Your skin glows with intensity.

Name: Rehydration
Benefits: You surround your body with a thin layer of water drawn from the moisture in the air.

Name: Resist Ruin
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your duskwalker heritage allows you to extend protection against negative energy to yourself or an ally in need.

Name: Revivification Protocal
Benefits: Your nanites are programmed to automatically revive you.

Name: Secret Eyes
Source: The Mwangi Expanse
Benefits: You can call forth an invisible eye to let you peek on secrets.

Name: See the Unseen
Source: The Mwangi Expanse
Benefits: You notice things that others can't see at all.

Name: Shadow Pact
Benefits: Thousands of years ago, your ancestors made a pact with Zon-Kuthon.

Name: Shadow's Assault
Benefits: Your shadow assaults your foes.

Name: Shaitan Skin
Benefits: When in danger, you can harden the stone in your skin into armor, much like a shaitan.

Name: Shinstabber
Benefits: You can dart around and between your larger allies' legs without tripping them up.

Name: Shory Aerialist
Prerequisites: Garundi ethnicity, Mauxi ethnicity, or Tian-Yae ethnicity; Shory Aeromancer or ability to cast fly
Benefits: Unique in Golarion’s history, the Shory people developed fighting styles dedicated to combat in the air.

Name: Skirt the Light
Benefits: You can travel the border between the Material and Shadow Planes and even bring others along.

Name: Skittering Sneak
Benefits: You squish, slink, and skitter from cover to cover with great speed and stealth.

Name: Spell Devourer
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You don't just resist magic; you devour it.

Name: Spew Tentacles
Benefits: You can open your mouth to an immense size and spew forth an impossibly large field of tentacles.

Name: Spiteful Rake
Benefits: Your instincts sing of spite and malice, and you've learned a devastating trick: go for the eyes.

Name: Steadfast Ally
Benefits: Your presence alone is enough to provide your allies with emotional support.

Name: Stubborn Persistence
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Humans are renowned for their ability to persist through the most grueling of trials.

Name: Suli Amir
Benefits: You have power connected to the powerful jann amirs.

Name: Summon Air Elemental
Benefits: You have a connection to the Inner Spheres, allowing you to summon an elemental ally.

Name: Summon Celestial Kin
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You have a connection to the celestial realms, allowing you to summon a celestial ally.

Name: Summon Earth Elemental
Benefits: You have a connection to the Inner Sphere, allowing you to summon an elemental ally.

Name: Summon Fiendish Kin
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You have a deep connection to the fiendish realms, allowing you to summon a fiend matching your own lineage.

Name: Summon Fire Elemental
Benefits: You can summon an elemental ally.

Name: Summon Water Elemental
Benefits: You can summon an elemental ally.

Name: Telluric Power
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You channel strength from the earth beneath your feet to pummel your enemies.

Name: Tengu Weapon Expertise
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Study has made you an expert with tengu weapons.

Name: Thunder God's Fan
Benefits: A wave of your fan unleashes the fury of the storm.

Name: Toppling Dance
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: While sharing a creature's space using Dance Underfoot, your weapons and unarmed attacks gain the trip trait, but only against the creature whose space you share.

Name: Translucent Skin
Benefits: Your body is translucent while underwater.

Name: Truespeech
Benefits: It is paramount that you are understood and you understand others; language need not impede your message.

Name: Unbreakable-er Goblin
Benefits: As hard as most unbreakable goblins are to break, you are that much harder to break.

Name: Unconventional Expertise
Prerequisites: Unconventional Weaponry; trained in the weapon you chose for Unconventional Weaponry
Benefits: You’ve continued to advance your powers using your unconventional weapon.

Name: Universal Longevity
Benefits: You’ve perfected your ability to keep up with all the skills you’ve learned over your long life.

Name: Unrivaled Builder
Benefits: Building things is like solving a puzzle, and you know how to use anything at your disposal to get the job done.

Name: Vanth's Weapon Expertise
Benefits: Vanths themselves recognize you as an honorary reaper.

Name: Very, Very Sneaky
Benefits: Your ability to hide is so great, you can disappear straight from vision.

Name: Vicious Snares
Benefits: You've learned how to create traps that cause greater injuries.

Name: Wandering Heart
Prerequisites: Arctic Elf, Cavern Elf, Desert Elf, Woodland Elf, or any other elf heritage based on adapting to an environment
Benefits: While all elves adapt to their environments over time, you have traveled so widely and become attuned to so many environs that your body now changes more rapidly than other elves.

Name: War Conditioning
Benefits: You have extensive training in remote environments, allowing you to move through these areas easily.

Name: Warren Digger
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You've learned to put your sturdy claws to work digging through the earth.

Name: We March On
Benefits: You make sure that your allies push themselves while traveling.

Name: Webslinger
Source: The Mwangi Expanse
Benefits: Your natural ability to create silken webs blends with your magical powers, allowing you to create impossibly large webs with great frequency.

Name: Absorb Spell
Prerequisites: Spellmaster Dedication; spell repertoire or ability to prepare spells
Benefits: You absorb a spell and store it in your body.

Name: Airborne Form
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: Your eidolon can fly.

Name: Allegro
Benefits: You can quicken your allies with a fast-paced performance.

Name: Anchoring Aura
Benefits: Your aura hampers fiends’ teleportation.

Name: Arcane Shroud
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: Your spell has a powerful aftereffect, briefly granting you a certain spell depending on the spell you cast.

Name: Armored Exercise
Prerequisites: Swordmaster Dedication; trained in light, medium, or heavy armor
Benefits: You've spent time training in your armor alongside other agents from the Swords.

Name: Aura of Life
Benefits: Your aura protects against necromantic effects.

Name: Aura of Preservation
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your aura protects against the twisting powers of aberrations.

Name: Aura of Righteousness
Benefits: Your righteous aura dampens evil’s might.

Name: Aura of Vengeance
Benefits: When you call upon others to take retribution, you also guide their aim.

Name: Awesome Blow
Benefits: Your attacks are so powerful, they can flatten your opponents.

Name: Bonded Focus
Benefits: Your connection to your bonded item increases your focus pool.

Name: Consume Spell
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: When you successfully Counterspell a spell of the tradition that matches your bloodline, you consume it, replenishing yourself with its energy.

Name: Death's Door
Benefits: You continue to fight when others would fall.

Name: Defensive Roll
Benefits: Dropping into a roll to disperse the force of the blow, you can partially evade a lethal attack and stay conscious.

Name: Deity's Protection
Benefits: When you call upon your deity’s power to fulfill the promise of their domain, you gain divine protection.

Name: Desperate Finisher
Benefits: You throw everything into one last press.

Name: Determination
Benefits: Your training allows you to shrug off your foes’ spells and conditions when the need is dire.

Name: Diverse Armor Expert
Prerequisites: Champion Dedication; expert in unarmored defense or one or more types of armor
Benefits: Your proficiency ranks for armor increase to expert.

Name: Divine Reflexes
Benefits: You can use your champion's reaction more.

Name: Dual Onslaught
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: When you lash out with both weapons, you leave no room for the target to escape your attack.

Name: Earworm
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: By endlessly repeating a motif, you implant an earworm, a memorable song that repeats over and over again in your allies' heads, preparing them to respond to it later.

Name: Ebb and Flow
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You can pull forth both positive and negative energy simultaneously to harm your enemies and heal your allies.

Name: Entities from Afar
Source: Pathfinder #164
Benefits: You can call in aberrations to fight for you or to answer questions.

Name: Explosive Death Drop
Benefits: You lift your enemy into the air before bringing them crashing down with a fiery detonation.

Name: Extend Armament Alignment
Benefits: The alignment you impose on a weapon lasts much longer.

Name: Fast Channel
Prerequisites: harmful font or healing font
Benefits: Divine power is always at your fingertips, swiftly responding to your call.

Name: Flamboyant Leap
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You stylishly leap and deliver a powerful finisher.

Name: Forceful Shot
Benefits: Your ranged attacks push your foes away from your allies.

Name: Forestall Curse
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You've learned to forestall the effects of your curse somewhat.

Name: Form Lock
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your ability to control your own ki empowers you to pressure other creatures into resuming their true forms.

Name: Giant's Lunge
Benefits: You extend your body and prepare to attack foes outside your normal reach.

Name: Glib Mutagen
Benefits: Your silvertongue mutagen transcends languages and plausibility.

Name: Greater Interpose
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your divine grace empowers you to avoid hits when you otherwise could not.

Name: Greater Merciful Elixir
Benefits: Your additives contain panaceas that can remedy a plethora of maladies.

Name: Guiding Finish
Benefits: Using your weapon as a lever, you force your opponent to end up right where you want them.

Name: Guiding Riposte
Benefits: By shifting your weight and angling your weapon, you guide your opponent to a more favorable position.

Name: Halcyon Spellcasting Adept
Prerequisites: Halcyon Spellcasting Initiate; master in either Arcana or Nature, expert in the other
Benefits: You refine your halcyon magic.

Name: Hammer Quake
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You smash the ground with your weapon, knocking nearby creatures to the ground.

Name: Hasted Assault
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: You can speed yourself up to move and attack more swiftly.

Name: Impaling Thrust
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You impale your enemy and hold them in place with your weapon.

Name: Impossible Riposte
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your ripostes can deflect attacks back at their source.

Name: Improved Twin Riposte (Fighter)
Benefits: Your weapons are a blur, blocking and biting at your foes.

Name: Incredible Recollection
Source: Pathfinder #164
Benefits: You can sift through knowledge locked within your mind at an incredible pace.

Name: Innocent Butterfly
Source: Pathfinder #166
Benefits: You know how to alter the perceptions of others.

Name: Instant Opening
Benefits: You distract your opponent with a few choice words or a rude gesture.

Name: Interweave Dispel
Prerequisites: dispel magic in your spell repertoire
Benefits: You weave dispelling energy into a spell, sending both effects at a foe.
